entry.title: Winter-Accessories Snowboard Tuning Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Winter Ski Accessories
Price: 22.00

Stage Snowboard Tuning Kit 


The Stage Snowboard Tuning Kit has everything you need to tune and maintain the edges and bases of your snowboard. Fill and repair scratches and core shots in your bases with the ptex candles and the steel scraper. Sharpen and bevel your edges with the variable angle edge tuner. Remove burrs from your edges and detune tips and tails with the stone. Keep your bases sliding fast and looking shiny with the bar of all temperature wax, the plastic scraper and the polishing pad. Keep your bindings on tight with the full set of 8 screws and washers. Store everything in the handy pouch. Save money and enjoy snowboarding more by tuning your own board with the Stage Snowboard Tuning Kit.

 

  • Includes: wax bar, black and clear ptex candles, plastic scraper, steel scraper, edge tuner, stone, base polishing pad, and full screw set
  • Zippered carry pouch make transport easy
  • Save money and improve your experience by tuning your own snowboard
  • Everything you need to tune and maintain your edges and bases
  • Dimensions: steel scraper 112 x 60 x 0.8 mm
  • Plastic scraper: 130 x 60 x 3 mm
  • Ptex sticks: 13 cm long
  • Screws: M6 x 16 mm
  • QTY-6

entry.title: Winter-Accessories Stage Brass Ski Tuning Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Winter Ski Accessories
Price: 7.00

Stage Brass Ski Tuning Brush 

A professional finish, the Stage Brass Ski Tuning Brush allows you to wax you skis like a pro, along with your iron and scraper your are good to go. Brass bristle brushes prepare the base for a fresh hot waxing by cleaning and clearing old wax and the dirt that builds up in it. The brass also opens up the pores of sintered base material to help bases absorb more wax. The outer ring of white nylon bristles clears away the dirt that the brass bristles clean from the base. Tuning your own skis saves money and ensures fun days on the mountain, do it the right way with the Stage Brass Brush.

 

  • Brass bristles clean old wax and dirt out of ski base structure
  • Ideal for base prep before hot waxing
  • Outer ring of white nylon bristles clears what the brass cleans from base
  • Brass brush opens ptex pores
  • QTY-6
entry.s:tag: Wholesale Ski or Snowboard Wax Brush Brass

entry.title: Winter-Accessories Stage Horse Hair Ski/Snowboard WaxTuning Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories
Type: Winter Ski Accessories
Price: 5.75

Stage Horse Hair Ski/Snowboard Wax Tuning Brush

A timely tool, the Stage horse hair brush is great for final polishing of skis and snowboards. This tool is effective for brushing out overlays and speed additives. The anti-static properties are helpful in removing static build-up caused by metal or nylon brushes. For hard waxes or excessive wax build-up start with the Stage nylon brush.

  • Final polishing brush
  • Brush out overlays and speed additives
  • Remove static build-up
  • 4.5 inches x 2.88 inches
  • Ergonomic wooden grip
  • QTY-6

entry.title: Winter-Accessories Maxi Glide Maxx Waxx
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories Dev
Type: Maxx Waxx
Price: 5.00

Maxi Glide Maxx Waxx

Fast and easy, Maxiglide Maxx Waxx is all you need, a rub on wax that works equally well on skis snowboards or any other snow equipment

Maxx Waxx is a unique super-fluorinated jojoba based universal ski and board wax. The original rub-in paste wax no ironing needed. Often called a "hot wax in a can" provides all the performance of a fresh hot wax without the time it takes to iron in wax.

It is the easiest and quickest way to treat all skis and boards. Simply rub-in base for smooth all day skiing. Best in man-made snow packed-powder corn snow changing conditions and when temperatures are -6c/20f or above. Applicator included.

Made from a base of jojoba oil a renewable desert plant. Another "Design for the Environment" product from Maxiglide.

  • For 20 degrees and above
  • Super-Fluorinated paste wax that comes with a foam applicator
  • 60 cc container fits in your pocket or ski bag with ease
  • Super fast super easy and super clean
  • Made in USA
  • 20 pieces per display box
  • QTY-20
